generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with visible road markings, including a pedestrian crossing and lane indicators, which are characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: There is a designated walkway on the left side of the road, bordered by curbs and vegetation, which is a sidewalk.
- building: Several multi-story residential buildings are visible in the background and on the left side of the image.
- wall: A stone wall runs along the side of the road, separating the road from a green area.
- fence: A low fence or barrier is visible along the side of the road, partially obscured by trees.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are clearly visible at the intersection, showing green signals.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a "No Entry" sign and a "No Parking" sign.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and bushes are present throughout the image, including along the road and in the background.
- terrain: Grass and other ground cover are visible in the areas not paved or covered by vegetation.
- person: A person is visible riding a bicycle on the right side of the road.
- rider: The person riding the bicycle is classified as a rider.
- car: A white van is visible parked on the right side of the road.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the right side of the road, being ridden by a person.
